executeMandate(address,uint16,bytes,uint.details: Called by the Powers protocol during action execution

handleRequest(address,address,uint16,byt.details: Must be overridden by implementing contracts

returns.values: ETH values to send with calls

executeMandate(address,uint16,bytes,uint.notice: Executes the mandate's logic: validation -> handling request -> call external -> replying to Powers

handleRequest(address,address,uint16,byt.notice: Handles requests from the Powers protocol and returns data _replyPowers and _changeState can use.
